basics.name: Colin Mackey
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: Colin was born and raised in Richmond, Virginia, and is now located in Falls Church. He has a degree in Computer Science from the University of Mary Washington. Colin's work takes him to the cutting edge of the Javascript universe, diving into frameworks with ruthless efficiency. While not working and confusing his co-workers with ES8, Colin enjoys drinking completely reasonable amounts of craft beer, building gaming computers, and keeping up to date on his ES syntax.

work.summary: Q Customer Intelligence is a Richmond, VA based startup providing retail marketers with a powerful tool for managing their customer base. At Q, Colin is responsible for development of their React JS application.
highlights: Startup app development with React/Webpack stack
API development experience with Node and Restify
Responsible for ground up front end development
Gained experience with small team development

work.summary: ICF International is a full service consulting company focusing on Environmental, Transportation, and Health and Human Services issues. During his time there, Colin worked on a team developing an application for the State of Pennsylvania
highlights: Used Node, Gulp, and Yeoman to scaffold and develop responsive themes
Leveraged AngularJS to build dynamic web forms
Full stack web development using Liferay Portal web framework
Assisted with server setup and wrote documentation for the system
Designed and developed the front end look and feel of system

work.summary: Deedod is a small web dev shop in Fredericksburg, Virginia where Colin interned during his time at Mary Washington. There he focused on learning Angular JS to develop a photo tagging system for a production blog system.
highlights: Contributed to a production blog as a full stack developer
Modified backend architecture to implement a photo tagging system
Worked in AngularJS, Cake PHP, and Laravel PHP, along with HTML and CSS
